conversations.english: Can I see your passport, please?
conversations.chinese: 请给我看看您的护照可以吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这个是非居民通道是吧?

title: 这正是签证官最想听到的答案

conversations.english: how did you do on your IELTS exam?
conversations.chinese: 你的雅思考试考的怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: fantastic! I got an overall score of eight.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好极了!我最后的总分考了8分

title: 延长学生签证 Student visa

conversations.english: I'd like to extend my visa for another two years.
conversations.chinese: 我要延长我的签证两年。
conversations.reply_english: Are you on a tourist visa or a student visa?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是使用旅游签证还是学生签证的？

title: 外籍人员需要申请工作许可证

conversations.english: Do you have the letter of approval of employment?
conversations.reply_english: No, I haven't got one. My employment petition hasn't been approved yet.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有，我还没拿到，我的工作许可证申请还没有获批。
